name: Slime Ranger (Sujal Kaintura)
description:
This Game was made for My First Game Jam Winters 2022. This game is an action RPG where you are a ranger trying to cure an infected population of slimes.

Controls
> Movement - WASD [arrow keys]
> Sprint - shift
> Cure - space [when slime is in range]
> Tranquilize - left click [Q]
> Multishot Heal - right click
> Drop Bait - E

Credits

- Sujal
